title: Compressed Air Leak Detector
description: Interactive simulation where students use an ultrasonic leak detector to diagnose compressed air leaks throughout a system schematic and prioritize repairs based on cost impact analysis. Supports Bloom's Analyze level with diagnose and prioritize verbs.
creator: Peter Vinck, Inflow Corp.
subject: Compressed Air Systems
Leak Detection
Energy Efficiency
Maintenance Prioritization
Ultrasonic Testing
Fluid Power Systems

prerequisites: Understanding of CFM, dB, and kWh units

controls.description: Click on 8 test points to probe with ultrasonic detector

controls.label: Tag Leak
controls.description: Records the current location as a detected leak

controls.label: Prioritize
controls.description: Sorts tagged leaks by cost impact and calculates score

controls.label: New Scenario
controls.description: Generates a new random set of leaks

controls.label: Electricity Rate
controls.description: Adjusts electricity rate to recalculate all annual costs
